justifications: Brexit is to be remembered as its final footnote-the final death cough of the British Empire.
The Brits had a choice between Queen Elizabeth II and the Commonwealth or the European Union (EU), America and President Hillary Clinton.

Britain was our portal to Europe, the EU and that imaginary globalist friend we have called 'the West' since our dramatic entry across the channel into Normandy on D Day. Now our door to Europe is closing.
Britain was our portal to Europe, the EU and that imaginary globalist friend we have called 'the West'.

references: his decision to blindly follow America into Iraq

justifications: The Prime Minister of Great Britain, Tony Blair, disgraced this week by a task force report seven years in the making on his decision to blindly follow America into Iraq.

references: his decision to blindly follow America into Iraq

justifications: Tony Blair...telling President George W. Bush: 'I will be with you, whatever.'

"You are going to have Scotland leave the U.K., which is going to cause the U.K. to lose its oil income, says the legendary investor Jim Rogers of Brexit as interviewed by James West for the Financial Post."

"You are going to have Europe doing everything it can to take business away from the City of London... The U.K. only has Scottish oil and the City of London. So when they lose both, you are going to have a small country... England and Wales perhaps."
